Description: Indicates that a document is received by the carrier or shipper
Indicates that a document is in draft mode being updated by either the shipper or the carrier.
Indicates that a document has been submitted by the shipper or carrier and is now awaiting approval by the counterpart.
Indicates that the carrier requested an update from the shipper which is not received yet.
Indicates that a document has been rejected by the carrier.
Indicates that a document has been approved by the counterpart.
Indicates that a document has been issued by the carrier.
Indicates that a document has been surrendered by the customer to the carrier.
Indicates that a document has been submitted by the customer to the carrier
Cancellation of an original transport document.
